pages.text: A curio sigil that channels demonic power into devastating unarmed combat. Master the way of the fist, empowered by demon will.

pages.title: Basic Abilities
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() Right-click to toggle$(br2)While active, grants:$(br)$(li)$(thing)+10 Unarmed Damage$() with knockback$(br)$(li)$(thing)Netherite + Efficiency V mining$() with bare hands$(br)$(li)On kill: $(effect)Resistance II$() (5s) + $(effect)Regeneration$() (2s)$(br)$(li)Applies $(effect)Soul Snare II$() (2s) on hit$(br)$(li)$(thing)Fall damage immunity$() (25 LP per fall)

pages.title: Projectile Catch
pages.text: With an $(thing)empty main hand$(), incoming projectiles can be caught instead of damaging you:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Arrows$() - regular and spectral$(br)$(li)$(bold)Tridents$()$(br)$(li)$(bold)Firework Rockets$()$(br2)The caught projectile goes directly into your main hand. Costs $(red)50 LP$() per catch.

pages.title: Demon Will Bonus
pages.text: The sigil grows stronger with demon will. Your unarmed attacks deal $(thing)bonus damage$() equal to a percentage of the target's maximum health:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)1 Will:$() +1% max HP damage$(br)$(li)$(bold)4096 Will:$() +15% max HP damage$(br2)Damage scales linearly between these values. All will types (Raw, Corrosive, etc.) are combined.

pages.title: Execute
pages.text: If your attack would leave an enemy below the $(thing)execute threshold$() (same % as your bonus damage), you perform an $(bold)Execute$():$(br2)$(li)$(gold)Instant kill$() the target$(br)$(li)$(green)+200 LP$() added to soul network$(br)$(li)$(red)-5 Will$() consumed from inventory$(br2)Requires at least 5 will to trigger. A burst of soul particles marks the kill.

pages.title: Reagent: Fist
pages.text: First, craft the Reagent of the Fist in an Alchemy Table.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Combine with a Reinforced Slate in an Alchemy Array to create the sigil.
